name: Robot Cubes
description:
Abstract and minimalistic co-op game.

Features:

  • Support for gamepads
  • 1-3 player (playtested for 2)
How to play

Different cubes have different points. Yellow cubes is a wild card that either doubles or halves your points, depending on how you take them. If a cube reaches the other end, you lose points.

Credits

Jimmie and Tord

Made with Python (3.8) and pygame (2.0)

Resources

All resource files are located in the res/ directory
